Check it out!

What is Substratum?

Substratum is an application, downloadable from the Play Store, that utilizes all of Sony's Overlay Manager Service (OMS), found on the official AOSP code review. This is similar to Layers in terms of stability and customization as it runs off an upgraded version of the Resource Runtime Overlay system, with the added benefit of running up-to-date Sony code on a customized ROM.

Features of Substratum

Simple & Lightweight

Never again will you need to worry about having themes being mutated in the background without you knowing!

Enthusiast Friendly

Always wanted to have your favorite theme in red? Background in black? As long as the themer adds support for it, anything is definitely possible!

Beautiful User Interface

Not only did we respect Google's Material Design to the core, we stepped beyond that to deliver a high quality user interface to match the feature support provided by Substratum!

Rootless at Heart

Afraid of the scary monsters we call Android malware? We are now running rootless as a base, enriching the user experience with a trusted, sandboxed experience!

Runtime Theming

Unlike our previous implementation of Layers, our theming system now swaps overlays on-the-fly! No longer will you have to reboot to switch a color, or a theme. Everything happens immediately!

FloatUI

A new feature that brings up a floating theme head to theme an application without being in Substratum! This works with every app and it is dismissable, just like your favorite chat messenger!

Runs off AOSP-approved code

Want to enjoy the best of AOSP stock? We do too. We did not want a theming system that would bog down over time, so Substratum will only run on user-demand, never in the background without knowing!

Backed by a wonderful community

Our contributors, themers and developers are always happy to help with issues regarding bugs, theming or even understanding code!

Completely Open Sourced

Our community is small. We need something to call ours, where every contributor feels welcomed to the project with open arms!

Check out our available themes on the market!

A theming engine is nothing without its community. Our community consists of many senior themers back in the day, as well as many new ones too!

App Features

A constant ever-growing list, made with love!

Advanced Manager

See all your overlays - enabled or disabled, then control them at your own will!

Defaults Manager

Don't like the theme you just applied? Quickly disable them all!

Dynamic Priority Switcher

Want that nav bar overlay on top of a theme's nav bar? No problem!

Profiling System

Light theme at day, dark theme at night!

FloatUI

Quickly switch between overlays from within your app! The fastest way possible!

Out-of-the-box Customizations

System sounds, boot animations, fonts and overlays with advanced features!

On-device Compilations

We compile overlay APKs directly on the device, based on your device framework!

Stable Backend and Active Development

Our team works hard on what we do, as we love what we are doing!
